channel.title: Instruments that would make Auxy better
channel.description:
- Oboe This can give an adventurous or a type of exploration feel to music. Example music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=knS1SbhmV94&t=25s
- Pirate Violin Would definitely be used for a popular music theme! Example music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DsemU6yb7hA
- Power Sound Thing I have no idea what this would be called. It's a creative one for sure, would use something like the instrument used in the main melody of the example below. It would probably a bit different and less retro, but it's a very strong and powerful instrument that could add variation to some types of music. Example music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mwrUem9vM_A

item.title: Instruments that would make Auxy better
item.dc:creator: Yozy
item.description:
• Oboe
    This can give an adventurous or a type of exploration feel to music.
    Example music: Flood Escape 2 OST - Lost Woods - YouTube

  • Pirate Violin
    Would definitely be used for a popular music theme!
    Example music: F-777 - The Seven Seas - YouTube

  • Power Sound Thing
    I have no idea what this would be called. It’s a creative one for sure, would use something like the instrument used in the main melody of the example below. It would probably a bit different and less retro, but it’s a very strong and powerful instrument that could add variation to some types of music.
    Example music: Undertale Ost: 099 - Power of -NEO- - YouTube

Read full topic
item.source: Instruments that would make Auxy better
